name: RESUME
body:
### **About**
My name is Delores Jones.  I presently live at 3974 N. Story Rd; Irving, TX  75038.  My phone number is 903-707-7795, and my email address is dh131703@gmail.com. I hold a Master Degree in Computer Science from Harrington University, Associate Degree from University of Phoenix, and presently working on my Bachelor's Degree from Ashford Unviersity in Business Administration with a concenstration in Entrepreneurship.

### **Career Focus**
Charismatic business professional, successful at managing business ventures and profit positions. Effectively guides new products and services from concept to market acceptance.  Influential business pioneer with an exemplary track record of cultivating talent and directing cohesive and focused sales teams. Skilled at establishing and maintaining strategic partnerships to generate essential business opportunities.

Creative Marketing Manager with broad-based background in highly competitive and dynamic organizations.  Recognized as a decisive leader and an excellent team player.  Motivated Marketing Manager with over 14 years marketing and product development experience, enabling startup and established companies to increase leads and revenue. Other expertise as a Web Developer are 


### **Summary of Skills**
Strong proposal writer, Web Developer, Programmer, Contract review, Financial analysis, Excellent communicator, Contract review


### **Professional Experience**
**Freelancer** (Web Developer / Programmer) August 2012 – Present
Coordinated installation of software systems and collaborated on the design and implementation of new features.  Delivered software solutions consistent with the product road map and released plan milestones.  Advised customers regarding maintenance of diverse software system.  Hands on experience with Web Applications and programming languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery and API's.  Detailed knowledge of functionality and hands on design experience with Web Services (REST).   Functional knowledge with Source control and application code deployment in multiple environments.

Strong knowledge of UI, general web functions and standards.  Working as a consultant/freelancer, I work independently and posse self-learning ability to apply latest technology and integrate third party software into application development.  Other expertise such as Angular, AngularJS, git, STACK, Unfuddle and node. j's.  Coordinated continued performance assurance of software applications and automated performance test scripts.  Utilizing the management system WordPress, I create professional themes, create full size image, and create logos and navigations to alleviate extra space.  Include sub-headlines and button, social media, video features, enable to work on all pc's devices, iPhone, tablets, and android devices. Widgets creation using Word press.  Other 
expertise is as following: Website development, Website designing.  Open source customization/ CMS, Ecommerce website development, Web Programming Services.  Customizing Website Development, PHP, Java, .Net Development, Logo Design, HTML design Corporate website design, PSD to XHTML/HTML, Joomla, Drupal, WordPress, Magento, OS Commerce, Zen Cart integration, PHP MySQL Development, PHP Frameworks, and JavaScript Frameworks etc.  Customer Service/Support.  JavaScript, HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, JQuery, Web Programming Skills, Teamwork, Verbal Communication, Web User Interface Design (UI), Object-Oriented Design, Web Services (REST). Any experiences in NoSQL database (MarkLogic), Xquery, IDE (IntelliJ IDEA), and Bower.

**Manager/PT** Jones Landscaping Construction - Tyler, TX; March 2004-2007 & 2012-Present
Managed team of 10 employees of professionals. Utilize customer services experience to complete bids, create and designed landscaping jobs.  Cold Calling, traveled with the manager to take notes and dictation at meetings.  Maintained household inventory and maintenance.  Utilizing the management system WordPress, I create professional themes, create full size images, and create logos and navigations to alleviate extra space.  Include sub-headlines and button, social media, video features, enable to work on all pc's devices, iPhone, tablets, and android devices. Customer Service.

**Executive Director** PTCS Consultant Firm, Azle, TX; January 2001 - July 2006 
Managed the day-to-day tactical and long-term strategic activities within the business. Conducted cost, schedule, contract performance, variance and risk analysis.  Reduced and controlled expenses by improving resource allocation.  Compiled and synthesized relevant business data such as financial, performance, AUM and headcount forecasts.  Maintained account plans for top client accounts.  Customer Service.  Drafted business plans, budgets and quarterly and semi-annual business reviews.  Presented company goals and objectives to new principals.  Coached and mentored staff members by offering constructive feedback and taking interest in their long-term career growth.


**Computer Programmer / Web Developer** SBC Technology – Memphis, TN; January 1989 - January 2000
Collaborated with designers to create clean interfaces and simple, intuitive interactions and experiences. Designed embedded systems software by applying key principles of computer science, engineering and mathematical analysis. Continually established clear operational specifications and formulated software requirements. Coordinated installation of software systems and collaborated on the design and implementation of new features.  Delivered software solutions consistent with the product road map and released plan milestones.  Advised customers regarding maintenance of diverse software system.  Hands on experience with Web Applications and programming languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery and API's.  Detailed knowledge of functionality and hands on design experience with Web Services (REST).   Functional knowledge with Source control and application code deployment in multiple environments.


### **References**
Mr. Walter Jones - 903-330-8565 / 
Mrs. Annie Mathis - 901-628-1665 /  
Ms. Bianca Bryant - 214-603-9781
